sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import { minutesToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; import { secondsToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function Pomodoro({focusTime, breakTime, sessionTime, setSessionTime, sessionType}) { const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); return (
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusTime)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
); } export default Pomodoro;
